attributes.description:
The Audi A4 Sedan. is a statement of sportiness, Thanks to a new language of design and an almost completely new body, the sporty character of the Audi A4 Sedan comes into play more than ever: it appears dynamic and powerful while attractive and aesthetic at the same time. A high-quality and functionally designed interior, innovative technologies in the fields of connected services, digitization, infotainment, and driver assistance systems, and powerful engines round off the overall package.

Factory fitted options:
- Tilting and sliding glass sunroof	
- Power front seats	
- Navigation System - High	
- Multi-function display/trip co	
- Alloy wheels, 5-spoke dynamic	
- Rear view camera system	
- Comfort key with sensor-control	
- Technology package for South Africa	
- Carbon spoiler on the tailgate	
- Audi Freeway Plan 5 years/100,000km

call us now to avoid disappointment, nationwide delivery is available.
